name: Product Manager (Middle/Junior/Senior)
description:
Osome is a Fintech startup with offices in London, Singapore, Hong Kong and Moscow.

We are building products for small and medium businesses to manage their Accounting, Bookkeeping, Inventory and other admin services online.

Our goal is to save time entrepreneurs spend on admin stuff. As well as to provide them with services which help to develop business. Now we operate in the UK, Singapore and Hong Kong.

As a startup, we have founders with a successful track record, top-tier investors who baked dozens of well-known IT companies. Our product management team consists of ex-employees from Google, Yandex, Tinkoff. Osome has already performed well and has ambitious plans. We need top people who learn quickly and are capable of bringing these plans to life.

As a Product Manager, you will lead a team that develops integrations with banks and financial services in the UK, Singapore and Hong Kong. The goal is to create one of our new services from scratch.

The role implies a lot of communication with tech and business people from other companies all around the world. However, the core competencies we expect from you are understanding of software development processes, APIs and data analysis.

We pay great attention to user experience and do our best to make data-driven decisions. One of our fundamental principles is trust. So, we are searching for autonomous entrepreneurial people, who can make decisions based on careful analysis.

We consider candidates of various levels, with different experience and backgrounds. The following factors are appreciated but are not mandatory:

  • you are a student of/was graduated with a bachelor/master degree from MIPT, MSU, HSE, BMSTU, ITMO University;
  • you have entrepreneurial experience;
  • you developed a b2b product as a product/project manager, data analyst, designer or engineer.


Responsibilities

  • Invent, prove and implement new processes and products
  • Come up with new ideas with data-inspired approach
  • Create, specify and bring technical tasks to release
  • Defend a result with analytical coverage
  • Search for product insights and points of growth
  • Collaborate with different stakeholders to create top-notch cross-product solutions

Requirements

  • Ability to work in English with English-speaking colleagues on a daily basis.
  • Strong analytical mindset. Ability to get to the bottom of the task.
  • Efficiency. Ability to get the job done.
  • SQL knowledge is welcomed
  • Development experience is welcomed

Benefits

  • Competitive salary with regular appraisals
  • Opportunity to join a startup experiencing fast growth (A round closed in June 2021) and influence the future of corporate services (millions of potential clients in our markets)
  • No bureaucracy: we work together to help you achieve your ambitions, answer to client needs and help the company grow

We will consider CV and cover letters in English only.
